pageProps.title: spaczz

data.title: spaczz
data.slogan: Fuzzy matching and more for spaCy.
data.description: Spaczz provides fuzzy matching and multi-token regex matching functionality for spaCy. Spaczz's components have similar APIs to their spaCy counterparts and spaczz pipeline components can integrate into spaCy pipelines where they can be saved/loaded as models.

data.author: Grant Andersen
